Disaster Risk

Code can be found on Github.

###

The code generates disaster measure introduced in Siriwardane (2015). To do it the code loads data on individual names options, fits SVI smiles into implied volatilities and isolates the jump component following Du and Kapadia (2012). Prior research (e.g. â€¦) found that small companies are more correlated with real economic activity. A disaster measure constructed from individual names rather than using options of aggregate indices highlights this distinction.

Below I show the disaster measure and contribution of different sectors. In particular, elevated disaster measure during the DotCom bubble is driven primarily by Business Equipment industry (tech) and in the GFC by Money industry (banks and insurance companies).
